page.title: 06Golf - The Game
page.content: I live next to the{Golf Links}and I am a junior player with my two brothers. It is an eighteen hole course. It is a good sport. I go in a lot of good competitions and my brother has won a cup. You use clubs to hit a ball onto a green. At first you drive it hard,then you put it gently in the hole which is marked with a flag. It is very popular especially with those who can afford it.The course is five miles long. There are many rules.If you play a lost ball it counts as a penalty.Playing another ball off the tee after losing a golf ball it becomes your third shot.Golf is shown on{television}a great deal.The pro-celebrity games are very good fun. There are many sorts of clubs.Some are special for putting,some are used for driving the ball right down the course.I love golf.
